title: description

title: properties.donorAllocations.items.properties.donor.oneOf.description

title: properties.donorAllocations.items.properties.donor.oneOf.properties.organization.description
Donation Promise: Represents a collection of people organized together into a community or other social
column3: commercial or political structure for the purposes of education. The group has some common purpose or reason for existence which goes beyond the set of people belonging to it and can act as an Agent. Organizations are often decomposable into hierarchical structures. In the higher education context
column9: and any other organizational unit that can act as an Agent.
